verbs.description: With [ARG0: President Donald Trump] about to [V: visit] [ARG1: Canada] [ARGM-PRP: for a G7 meeting] , and a conference on U.S .- Canadian trade about to open in Mobile , international unease about trade relations continued to bloom over the weekend .

With President Donald Trump about to visit Canada for a G7 meeting , and [ARG1: a conference on U.S .- Canadian trade] about to [V: open] [ARGM-LOC: in Mobile] , international unease about trade relations continued to bloom over the weekend .

[ARGM-ADV: With President Donald Trump about to visit Canada for a G7 meeting , and a conference on U.S .- Canadian trade about to open in Mobile] , [ARG1: international unease about trade relations] [V: continued] [C-ARG1: to bloom over the weekend] .

With President Donald Trump about to visit Canada for a G7 meeting , and a conference on U.S .- Canadian trade about to open in Mobile , [ARG1: international unease about trade relations] continued to [V: bloom] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] .
